name: Salvator (itch) (Sytka)
description:
Salvator is an old-school action-shooter game with 33 levels. Your task is very simple:

1. Rescue all the people in each level.
2. Collect the requested stars.
3. Destroy the requested enemies.
4. Return to the base.

Controls are:

- Control your helicopter with cursor keys
- ALT - reversing
- CTRL - shooting
- SPACE - drop a bomb
- ENTER - use your hook for taking boxes
- ESC - game menu

Good luck!
